entry.title: FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT, Lambton Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:06 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 6.5°C
entry.summary:

Temperature: 6.5°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 57 %

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero with patchy frost. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low zero with patchy frost. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 16. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016
